text: When the temperatures start to drop, there's no better way to keep warm and glamorous than in a furry coat. From candy colored pastels to animal prints and oversize belted toppers, there's plenty of statement-making faux fur outerwear to choose from for a little bit of luxury this season. Whether you're looking for a bold animal print, a sweet blush pink, or classic jet black, click through to shop the best faux fur coats at every price point.
title: 20 Faux Fur Coats That Will Have You Looking Like a Rich B*tch This Season
